versos: (washed) Hebrews 10:22: "Let us draw near to God with a sincere heart and with the full assurance that faith brings, having our hearts sprinkled to cleanse us from a guilty conscience and having our bodies washed with pure water.";;;
(welfare) Psalm 122:7 - "May there be peace within your walls and security within your citadels.";;;
(health) Proverbs 3:8 - "This will bring health to your body and nourishment to your bones.";;;
(gracious) Psalm 103:8 - "The Lord is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and rich in love.";;;
(chamber) Matthew 24:26 - "Therefore if they say to you, 'Look, He is in the desert' do not go out; or 'Look, He is in the inner rooms' do not believe it.";;;
(merry) Luke 2:10 - But the angel said to them, "Do not be afraid. I bring you good news that will cause great joy for all the people.";;;
(overtake) 1 Thessalonians 5:4 - "But you, brothers and sisters, are not in darkness so that this day should overtake you like a thief.";;;
(rewarded) Hebrews 11:6 - "And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who earnestly seek him.";;;
(drinketh) 1 Corinthians 10:21 - "Ye cannot drink the cup of the Lord, and the cup of devils: ye cannot be partakers of the Lord's table, and of the table of devils.";;;
(forbid) Ephesians 4:27 - "And do not give the devil a foothold.";;;
(assyria) Isaiah 19:23 - In that day there will be a highway from Egypt to assyria. The Assyrians will go to Egypt and the Egyptians to assyria. The Egyptians and Assyrians will worship together.;;;
(bondman) Leviticus 25:42 - "For they are my servants, which I brought forth out of the land of Egypt: they shall not be sold as bondmen.";;;
(refrain) Proverbs 20:19 - "A gossip betrays a confidence; so avoid anyone who talks too much.";;;
(aloud) Psalm 5:3 - "In the morning, LORD, you hear my voice; in the morning I lay my requests before you and wait expectantly.";;;
(goshen) Genesis 47:27: "Now Israel lived in the land of Egypt, in goshen, and they acquired property in it and were fruitful and multiplied greatly.";;;
(poverty) Proverbs 10:15 - "The wealth of the rich is their fortified city, but poverty is the ruin of the poor.";;;
(fame) Psalm 44:15 - "I will make their nobles as famous as if they were a fire in a forest, and like a flame in a field.";;;
(wagons) Genesis 45:27 - They told him, "Joseph is still alive In fact, he is ruler of all Egypt." Jacob was stunned; he did not believe them.;;;
